```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(rentrez)
heartConditions = read.table('../data/conditionList.tsv', sep='\t', header = TRUE)
```


```{r}
heartConditions$PubmedCount = 0
for (i in 1:nrow(heartConditions)) {
    tmp <- entrez_search(db='pubmed', term=heartConditions[i,'HPOTermName'])
    heartConditions[i, 'PubmedCount'] <- tmp$count
}
```

```{r}
ggplot(heartConditions) +
    geom_bar(aes(x=HPOTermName,y=PubmedCount), stat='identity') +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=30,hjust=1))
```
